subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] and it gets freakier.

full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I think part of the animosity between the scientist/skeptic and the paranor=
malist/believer, is that they are speaking a different language, and often =
don=E2=80=99t know it.



Both come up with theories. =C2=A0And these may l=
ead to conclusions. =C2=A0A scientist frames this as part of the scientific=
 method, and expects a lot of work to be done between the theory and the co=
nclusions. =C2=A0A believer often starts with a theory, =C2=A0and then stat=
es new things based on that. =C2=A0The scientist interprets the believer=E2=
=80=99s statements as the believers =E2=80=98conclusions=E2=80=99, and is a=
ppalled at the lack of process that got the believer from theory to conclus=
ion. =C2=A0



The believer is appalled at the scientist's closed mind. =C2=
=A0But in fact, the believer did not mean their statements to actually be c=
onclusions, in the scientific sense. =C2=A0=C2=A0The believer thinks about =
their theories, maybe tests them, and more often than not, comes up with ne=
w THEORIES. =C2=A0But by not stating that these are theories, the scientist=
 sees them as conclusions (since they seemed to flow from theory and testin=
g). =C2=A0And hence, the friction between these camps.



So I think both p=
arties share some of the blame. =C2=A0The scientist assumes the believer un=
derstands the scientific method, and is making conclusions from the scienti=
fic method, when the believer may really just be detailing more theories. =
=C2=A0The believer watches scientific-looking tv shows, uses scientific-loo=
king equipment, and uses scientific-sounding words like =E2=80=98theory=E2=
=80=99 and =E2=80=98evidence=E2=80=99, without realizing this casts them in=
to the scientific method in the ears of the scientific community.



What t=
o do? =C2=A0I think if the scientist/skeptic more often asked things like =
=E2=80=9CAre you sure of that, or is that a theory?=E2=80=9D, and the paran=
ormalist/believer used the word =E2=80=98theory=E2=80=99 a lot more in thei=
r proclamations, it would go a long way toward less hostilities.

h magick, your spirit, etc.


Just sayin' :)

[Att=
achment(s) from Frank Sumption included below] 

=C2=A0For crying out loud!=
! It means the god damn skeptics gots ya so freaking brainwashed that nothi=
ng is acceptable and they have robbed you and everyone else of your magic! =
That is your spirit. I, and apparently I am the only one, will not lay down=
 and let the NAZI jerks diminish me into oblivion! If you are just a piece =
of meat how can you have any value or importance? You are just a worker dro=
ne=C2=A0to some corporate-fascist NAZI rich prick that pays these debunker/=
skeptics to keep your dumbass in line!=C2=A0Psychology works better than an=
y other method.=C2=A0I can tell you for what--there is a huge comet coming,=
 it's gonna hit and these jerks don't want hords of unwashed masses over ru=
nning their bunkers-you are just supposed to lay down and die!

=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0No-No, let them convince you I am just some loud mouth=C2=A0hillbilly, m=
y words mean nothing. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Yeah, meeeeza had about enough talking/=
typing to the brain dead. Ya can't discuss anything, ya can't present any "=
evidence", ya can't show there's other methods. It's freaking useless! 

=
=C2=A0
=C2=A0The voice-from TRF, as if anyone will listen--"See There's a H=
uge Comet--It Moves The Opposite Way--It's Gonna Kill Us". I know! Y'all kn=
ow better, so I'll stop now. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Maybe I am wrong and voices are =
wrong-- I don't care, at least I can stand up and speak what I think is imp=
ortant, even if it is against the party line.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank-S
